item.title: Does anyone know how to make this?
item.dc:creator: @MikeFerd MikeFerd
item.description:
@MikeFerd wrote:

Atm I got this…

But 1st off it don’t work when i click on pure or reg player.
2nd i get a string out of range 21 when i log out of the account.

   public void newplayer() {
sendQuest("Close Window", 8386);//Close Text
sendQuest("Choose to be a Pure or a normal player!", 8383);//Line 3
sendQuest("Pure", 8384);//Line 4
sendQuest("", 8385);//Line 5
sendQuest("", 8388);//Line 7
sendQuest("Regular Player", 8394);//Line 8
sendQuest("", 8395);//Line 9
sendQuest("", 8396);//Line 10
sendQuest("", 8397);//Line 11
sendQuest("", 8398);//Line 12
showInterface(8292);
flushOutStream();
}
public void pureorplayer() { //PureorPlayer
            if (pure == 0) {
            if (type == 2) {
		addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
		addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
		addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
                pure = 1;
                sM("You are now a pure!");
                closeInterface();
            }
}
            if (type == 7 && pure == 0) {
              closeInterface();   
          } 
                sM("A good player never cheats his stats =].");
            }

added this in case 185


                    case 32190:
                        pureorplayer(2);
                        break;
                    case 32201:
                        pureorplayer(7);
                        break;

and i added this under welcome to scape…

if(pure == 0){
newplayer();
}

I also added this

					} else if (token.equals("character-pure")) {
						pure = Integer.parseInt(token2);
					}
characterfile.write("character-pure = ", 0, 21);
      			characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pure), 0, Integer.toString(lamestarter).length());

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how to make this?
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I am just taking a wild guess but if u click on the one of the options several times your command prompt window that you started to run your server should say some thing like [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Loading finished. [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052 [client-1-Mod Jeremy]: Case 185: Action Button: 52052

And if u get something like this then u need to make a case like “case 52052” and give it a function

Actually i think thats for the emote tabs but it may work for your thing 2

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how to make this?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Open client.java and search for

Case 185:
Click on the button then look in your runserver command prompt. Use that case and hopefully you know what to do next

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how to make this?
item.dc:creator: @MikeFerd MikeFerd
item.description:
@MikeFerd wrote:

Really want to know. when u click it it gies u 99

I got this so far.

But 1st off it don’t work when i click on pure or reg player.
2nd i get a string out of range 21 when i log out of the account.

   public void newplayer() {
sendQuest("Close Window", 8386);//Close Text
sendQuest("Choose to be a Pure or a normal player!", 8383);//Line 3
sendQuest("Pure", 8384);//Line 4
sendQuest("", 8385);//Line 5
sendQuest("", 8388);//Line 7
sendQuest("Regular Player", 8394);//Line 8
sendQuest("", 8395);//Line 9
sendQuest("", 8396);//Line 10
sendQuest("", 8397);//Line 11
sendQuest("", 8398);//Line 12
showInterface(8292);
flushOutStream();
}
public void pureorplayer() { //PureorPlayer
            if (pure == 0) {
            if (type == 2) {
		addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
		addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
		addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
                pure = 1;
                sM("You are now a pure!");
                closeInterface();
            }
}
            if (type == 7 && pure == 0) {
              closeInterface();   
          } 
                sM("A good player never cheats his stats =].");
            }

added this in case 185


                    case 32190:
                        pureorplayer(2);
                        break;
                    case 32201:
                        pureorplayer(7);
                        break;

and i added this under welcome to scape…

if(pure == 0){
newplayer();
}

I also added this

					} else if (token.equals("character-pure")) {
						pure = Integer.parseInt(token2);
					}
characterfile.write("character-pure = ", 0, 21);
      			characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pure), 0, Integer.toString(lamestarter).length());
